title:
Numerical semigroups from rational matrices I: power-integral matrices
  and nilpotent representations
authors: Arsh Chhabra, Stephan Ramon Garcia, Fangqian Zhang, Hechun Zhang
abstract:
Our aim in this paper is to initiate the study of exponent semigroups for
rational matrices. We prove that every numerical semigroup is the exponent
semigroup of some rational matrix. We also obtain lower bounds on the size of
such matrices and discuss the related class of power-integral matrices.
